cta.title: Hi, I'm Vahe — Full Stack Developer
cta.description: Developing scalable products with a strong focus on high performance, stability, and enhancing user experience for businesses.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: My professional journey, key roles, and achievements in various companies.

activity.title: Extracurricular Activities
activity.description: My projects and initiatives outside of my main work.
activity.opensource: I participate in the development of the open-source ecosystem — from Nuxt UI to LibreTranslate and other projects.
activity.personal: In my free time, I work on various initiatives and collaborative projects: OTA-KU, Currenzy, GeoFence, Hentai-Voice, and others.

achievements.title: My Achievements
achievements.description: Below are key milestones in my professional journey.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: My name is Vahe, I am {age} years old. I am a full-stack developer specializing in Nuxt.js and Laravel. I create fast and convenient web applications, have experience with microservices, APIs (REST and GraphQL), system integration, and complex UIs. I value reliability, clean code, and projects that deliver real impact.

projects.title: What I Create and Develop
projects.description: Author's projects and commercial cases brought to life from scratch — from idea to scaling. I implement solutions in IT, design, and related creative and business areas.
projects.whatIOffer: I’ll gladly help bring your idea to life — from concept to a ready-made solution. Describe what you want, and we’ll discuss everything in detail.

shop.title: Custom Solutions and Projects
shop.description: I sell and share my own work — from sleek landing pages to scalable microservice systems and turnkey solutions. Everything you need to launch and grow your product.
